Title: Devote yourself completely to the building up of national defense, commitment to the people is the highest duty
Publisher: Zhongguo jiefangjun Nanjing junqu zong zhuangbei bu (中国解放军南京军区总装备部)
Notes: From a series devoted to the PRC military, related to the conflict over the Diaoyu (Senkaku/Pescadores) islands. The series was published by the PLA General Armament Department of the Nanjing Military Region and intended for internal (内部) use only.
